p: LA (18:2) is a polyunsaturated omega-6 fatty acid with two double bounds in the 9 and 12 carbons. Together with Î±-linolenic acid (ALA), LA constitutes the essential fatty acids, which the human body cannot synthesize by itself. The European Food Safety Authority (EFSA) authorized a health claim stating that LA and ALA are needed for the normal growth and development of children [ 34].
